entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023
